title: Your Thumb is Big Enough...CARD SOLD WITHOUT THUMB
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Your Thumb is Big Enough...CARD SOLD WITHOUT THUMB
posts.post_content:
.... to make this Willis throwing card Near Mint.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/z-folder/46217/nm-willis[/IMG]

When viewing the reverse, place your thumb over the upper right portion of the card and bingo, you have a NM Hall of Famer.

You wont be paying for a NM Hall of Famer though.  It is truly your lucky day.
Asking $70 shipped for Vic professionally graded by PSA in Good (2) condition.

I anticipate that one of you who professes to care only about the presentation of the front to snap this up in a hurry.  I am going to the Post Office Tuesday morning.  Will your address be on one of the packets I am shipping?

Did you know that only 1 out of 256 PSA cert numbers contains only "even" numbers?  This fact alone makes adding 26482286 to your collection a no brainer, even if you don't have a thumb.:eek:

Despite the defect, every word on the reverse is legible.

Enough suspense.  Here it is.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/45900/willis-throwing[/IMG]

Any form of payment net to me suffices.  Thanks for taking a peek.
You sound more like a chiropractor than an MD -- you made an adjustment for a bad back.  :eek:

The next buyer of this card must have missed this listing three days ago, so I am extending the courtesy of bumping it to the top in hopes that he will not miss it again.  I am also reducing the asking price to an even $70, so he can purchase both the card and his favorite beverage at Starbucks today.  I sincerely hope that he isn't wasted away again in Margaritaville. :D
